title: THDC, Maharashtra ink pact for six pumped hydro storage units of 6,790 mw
description: THDC India Ltd has signed an MoU with the Maharashtra government for six pumped hydro storage projects totaling 6,790 MW. This initiative involves an investment of over Rs33,600 crore and includes surveys, investigations, and detailed project reports. The Maharashtra government will assist in water allocation for these projects.
